create.title: Pull Request
create.subtitle: Creates a new pull request for {{repositoryName}}

diff.not-supported: Diffs for pull request are not supported by the type of repository

scm-review-plugin.no-requests: No pull requests matching the selected criteria found

confirm-alert.title: Merge Pull Request
confirm-alert.message: Do you really want to merge?

confirm-alert.title: Reject Pull Request
confirm-alert.message: Do you really want to reject this pull request?

confirm-alert.title: Delete comment
confirm-alert.message: Do you really want to delete the comment?

confirm-cancel-update-alert.title: Cancel Update
confirm-cancel-update-alert.message: Do you really want to reject the modifications on the comment?

commentPullRequest.description: May add comments to pull requests

modifyPullRequest.description: May modify/delete comments from other users in pull requests

mergePullRequest.description: May merge or reject pull requests
